reference.title: learningGroupMapRef
reference.shortdesc: Use a learningGroupMapRef element to include a map reference to a learning group map as part of a DITA learningMap, learningBookMap, learningGroupMap, or learningGroup.

section.title: Description and Semantics
section.p: The learningGroupMapRef is a mapref specialization included in the DITA Learning and Training Map domain. It is used to reference a single learningGroupMap, either from a learningMap, learningBookMap, learningGroupMap or learningGroup.

The hierarchy of the referenced learningGroupMap is merged into the container map or learningGroup at the position of the reference, and the relationship tables of the child map are added to the parent map. Last sentence is from mapref. Need to confirm expected behaviour.
